text: Steve Bernard (born 28 December 1949) is an Australian cricketer and referee. He played his Domestic matches for New South Wales. Bernard serves as a member of the ICC Associate and Affiliate Panel of Referee representing Australia. ==See also== * List of New South Wales representative cricketers ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Australian cricketers Category:New South Wales cricketers
title: Steve Bernard (cricketer)
